title: queryparser/xml CoreParser to implement SpanQueryBuilder interface
description:
straightforward change:

	queryparser/xml CoreParser to implement the SpanQueryBuilder interface
	also: addition of a convenience addSpanQueryBuilder method (the equivalent of addQueryBuilder + addSpanBuilder)

comments.content: Attaching proposed patch by Daniel Collins and Christine Poerschke - https://github.com/bloomberg/lucene-solr/pull/188 - see SOLR-9933 for the Solr portion of the proposed changes.
